conbody.p: Install additional stage libraries to use stages that are not included in the core RPM or core tarball installation of . This is an optional step, but generally you'll want to install additional stage libraries to process data after completing a core installation.
For a complete list of the stages installed with each stage library, see .
conbody.note: You must perform additional steps to install the MapR stage libraries, as described in .
conbody.p: You can install additional RPM stage libraries using the command line program.
You can install additional tarball stage libraries using the Package Manager within or using the command line program.
conbody.note: An installation with Cloudera Manager includes all available stage libraries. As a result, you cannot use the Package Manager or the command line program to install or uninstall additional stage libraries in a Cloudera Manager installation.
conbody.p: When necessary, you can also install legacy stage libraries for all installation types.
